title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Internationalization of Higher Education and Remote Learning Strategies in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of higher education systems and foundational concepts of distance education
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Design and implementation of three or more blended learning models to address the learning gap between international and local students
Development of five or more communication strategies considering cultural differences in remote education environments
Application of three or more technological solutions to enhance interactivity in large-scale online lectures

Learners will select three or more core indicator areas (e.g., digital infrastructure, student exchange policies, online education quality management) to evaluate the sustainability of higher education internationalization in a pandemic context and propose a systematic evaluation framework including three or more detailed indicators per area.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
